name: Cosmo Chaser
detailed_description:
Experience the new style of vertical scroll shooter game.
In a cylindrically molded 2D space, you have to defeat unlimited waves of enemy space drones and protect passengers of interstellar cruiser.
Uniquely designed 14 enemy drones shows different tactical maneuver and attack. Drone attacks will fill the screen with storm of bullets, but you can always dodge them and win the battle because there's no dead-end corner in this game.
You'll find versatile joy of fixed direction shooting action in Cosmo Chaser.

FEATURES

  • Classic arcade style massive enemy shooting battle.
  • Zero delay respawn after player's destroy.
  • Unique 360 degree auto-aiming duel system at boss stage.
  • Cruise ship defense mission at same time of enemy fight.

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500
